4240256197.name: Empowering Largesse
4240256197.description: This mod has been deprecated and no longer functions. You may replace it with another mod.

4258747542.name: Enhanced Auto Rifle Loader
4258747542.description: This mod has been deprecated and no longer functions. You may replace it with another mod.

4272180932.name: Argent Ordnance
4272180932.description: While Charged with Light, readying or firing a Rocket Launcher grants it increased damage and reload speed. Damaging a combatant with a rocket consumes one stack of Charged with Light.

4272180933.name: Sustained Charge
4272180933.description: Become Charged with Light by rapidly defeating combatants with Auto Rifles, Trace Rifles, or Machine Guns. Additional copies of this mod increase the time allowed between combatants that are defeated.

4272180934.name: Supercharged
4272180934.description: You can have 2 additional stacks of Charged with Light, up to a maximum of 5.

4272180935.name: Kindling the Flame
4272180935.description: While Charged with Light, reviving a downed Guardian gives you a burst of healing, consuming one stack of Charged with Light.

4288515060.name: Bountiful Wells
4288515060.description: Elemental well mods that cause you to spawn elemental wells can now stack, spawning additional wells for each additional copy of the mod you have equipped.

4288515061.name: Well of Ordnance
4288515061.description: Picking up a Solar elemental well grants you additional grenade energy. Multiple copies of this mod increase this effect.
